&#3926;&#3956;&#3928;&#3851;&#3924;: [1836] ... 1) kha g.yer ba dang lto ldir ba'i snod cig ... chang gi bum pa/ ... me tog bum pa/ ... snag bum/ ... 2) chu 'khor dang lag mchig gi 'bru blug khung/ ...
mtshan nyid/  lto ldir zhabs zhum chu skyor gyi don byed nus pa/
Definition: bulbous, flat bottomed, and able to perform the function of holding water [from DharmakIrti]
As n. of a medical implement, see under me bum.

holy water vessel, sacred bowl, * (as treasury of all desires), bottle, ritual vessel, *-belly stomach, water-bottle, flask, bottle-shaped ornaments in architecture, *, urn, earthen jar, vessel for water, (1 of khyim bcu gnyis), ceremonial *, ceremonial *
